## Description {#details}

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> class.

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This returns true when the instruction defines a value of a TargetIndex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand that can be tracked by offsets. For Wasm, this returns true for only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// local.set/local.tees. This is currently used by LiveDebugValues analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These are not included:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - In theory we need to add global.set here too, but we don&#39;t have global</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   indices at this point because they are relocatable and we address them by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   names until linking, so we don&#39;t have &#39;offsets&#39; (which are used to store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   local/global indices) to deal with in LiveDebugValues. And we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   associate debug info in values in globals anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - All other value-producing instructions, i.e. instructions with defs, can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   define values in the Wasm stack, which is represented by TI&#95;OPERAND&#95;STACK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   TargetIndex. But they don&#39;t have offset info within the instruction itself,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   and debug info analysis for them is handled separately in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   WebAssemblyDebugFixup pass, so we don&#39;t worry about them here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyinstrinfo/#a5255e72bcf98efe146a049652e01d308"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyinstrinfo/#a5255e72bcf98efe146a049652e01d308">WebAssemblyInstrInfo::isExplicitTargetIndexDef</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Index,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                    int64&#95;t &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
